you_kitten_1: Rest now, little one. Dream of the great warrior you'll become one day.
introspective_to_NB: How did you get so far away from the nursery? Where's your parent?
Hm... You need to go back there, they'll be worrying about you.
sweet_6: Ohh, look at you! You're so tiny!! Ah- that's so precious.
Oh my, and you have a ferocious mew too! Ah, you'll make a wonderful warrior someday, I just know it.
You're so little, yet I know you're going to make everyone proud.. Just by being yourself.
assertive_parent11: Hey, y_c, play nice! Be careful with your playmates!

assertive_insult: Hehehe! Little guy's got a mouth on 'em! That's hilarious!
r_c! Guess what y_c just called me! Ahahaha!
sweetgrieving_5: O- Oh! Oh, you want a story, little one? A... About d_c...
Okay.. I'm.. I'm sorry if I get a little... teary... but I don't want them to be forgotten. Let me tell you about one of the most wonderful cats in the Clans.
assertive_insult1: Try that again, and see what happens, pipsqueak.
I could chew you up and spit you out again without thinking twice about it.
assertive_murder4_2: y_c, I ... why wouldn't you tell me?

I know I taught you to take risks, but this isn't what I meant!

There's still no fresh kill. Nothing's been found.
[Their voice hitched and they sniffed quietly to themself.]

assertive_parent13: What's that, y_c? You wanna play? Sure! You can be the leader, and I'll be the rogue.
Stop right there, clan cat! Where do you think you're going? I, leader of the rogues, will stop you! Muahahaha!
Wait, stop! What are you doing? AHHH!!!!
[t_c flops over on the ground dramatically. You clamber up onto their body and tug on their ears, giggling hysterically.]
upstanding_general1: Is this little scrap of fur the new addition to the clan?
Hmph. Let's just hope they stay out of trouble, that seems to be an issue for a lot of the kits around here.
sweet_7: Hello, little one! Welcome to c_nClan! What a cute lil fella, you are.
Here we go, let me take you back to your nest. Little ones like you need plenty of rest to become big strong warriors!
sweet_8: Now now, you've gotta stay near your nest. Those big stinky cats might not see you there!
There we are! Ah- I've been meaning to bring this to you anyway. It's a little bundle of moss you can cuddle with!
introspective_to_NB_1: [You, while stumbling around outside the nursery, trip over t_c's tail, and faceplant at their feet.]

... Did a bird just land on my tail?
introspective_to_NB_2: Hi, little one. You must be y_c.
Aren't you a cute little thing?
Aw, coming to the nursery just makes me want to have kits of my own. I doubt if that'll ever happen though.
assertive_1: You're gonna do great things someday, kiddo, I just know it.
stable_8: Your little button nose and beady eyes, your fluffy tail and ears.
I could just gobble you up- No! No, no, no, no, no... That was a joke, I didn't mean to make you cry...
stable_9: Look at you, young one. Soon it won't be long before your running around camp, stirring up a storm.
I remember when I was that age, goodness, that was so long ago. Well, not that I remember, what I could see nor hear- but I remember my parent's voice.
Their calm whispers of support, their promises of love and the way they said my name- I don't remember much, but just a sense of protection. A sense of love.
Little kit, you may not remember this when you're older, but I hope you remember this feeling of warmth.
So I'll say this, you are loved y_c, loved by c_nClan and all the cats here. We can't wait to see what you do next.
stable_9_2: Why do you look like that?
you_kitten_2: Hey, kit! Let's practice the hunting crouch.

you_kitten_3: Heh, you didn't see me coming, did you, little one?
One day you'll be as sneaky as me.
you_kitten_4: It's important to listen and learn, little y_c. This clan relies on each of us doing our part.
you_kitten_5: Oh! Be careful near the brambles, dear kit. It's easy to get hurt.
you_kitten_6: Stay close to your mentor, once you're an apprentice.
c_nClan's territory spans thousands of tail-lengths. It's easy to get lost if you wander too far.

[You decide to leave them to it...?]

you_newborn2: Oh! Oh! Look, r_c. y_c is purring!

you_kitten_brooding2: Hmph... I have no time to speak with you, kit. Go back to the nursery.

Haha, did you see that? They didn't even blink!
you_kitten_10: The stars seem so distant, yet I feel like our ancestors are right here, watching over us.

you_kitten_11: Rules are there for a reason, y_c.

you_kitten_12: You worried about your first hunt, y_c?

brooding_kitten2: Don't you have something better to be doing?

brooding_kitten3: What is it? Can't you see that I'm busy?
You want to ... play a game with me?

brooding_kitten4: y_c. I have something for you.
[t_c drops a smooth pebble at your paws.]

brooding_kitten5: Hm? Why are you crying, y_c?

brooding_kitten5_2: [t_c points out a bird perching on a tree in camp.]

brooding_kitten6: StarClan, I have the worst headache ...
brooding_kitten7: What is it? What do you need?

brooding_kitten8: Tch. Not now, y_c. I'm not interested in kit games.
Heh. I used to love that game.
And you speak of this to anyone, I'll never play with you again. Got it?
brooding_parent: y_c, why don't you go out and play with the other kits?
Heh. That's okay. I was never that outgoing at your age, either.
You can just stay here with me until you're ready to make some new friends.
brooding_parent1: [r_q caught you being naughty and demanded to meet with your parent, t_c, about it.]
Alright ... what'd you do this time, y_c?
You ... called r_c a mange-face because they were ignoring you?
I mean, uh -- That was very bad of you, y_c! Never do it again!
brooding_parent2: [You tell t_c all about the dream you had last night, and they listen patiently.]
brooding_parent3: [t_c points out the shining water drops that clings to the blades of grass along the nursery.]

brooding_parent4: y_c, you want a badger ride?
[You clamber onto t_c's back and they parade you around camp, laughing and giggling.]

[The rest of your clanmates seem awestruck. t_c must not act like this very often.]

brooding_parent6: Come back to the nursery, where it's safe.
brooding_parent7: Hm? You and r_k wanna play outside?

they_grieving: [t_c doesn't seem like they want to talk right now.]
general_2: As if I couldn't like you any less ...
parent_you_ill: [You wake up in the middle of the night to a warmth against your pelt and soft humming.]

[You close your eyes and drift off to sleep again, comforted by their presence.]
brooding_insult_1: What did you just say to me ... ?
brooding_insult_3: [t_c curls their lip at you and stalks away.]
neurotic_insult_1: Oh yeah? Well you're a - a ... uhm ... uh ...

neurotic_insult_2: Is that really how you think of me?

sweet_insult_1: That's not very nice of you to say...
insult1: Hey! Where'd you learn those words from?
sweet_insult_3: You... you don't really mean that... do you, y_c...?
silly_insult_4: Oh, like I'd take anything you say seriously.

unlawful_insult_2: ...You're lucky that r_c is here. Otherwise, I don't think you'd want to know what I would do to you.
unlawful_insult_3: ...you're so damn lucky I haven't shredded you to pieces yet.
unabashed_insult_2: I may not be cool, but you're mean. And personally, I think that's worse.
brooding_nice_tokit: You ... want to know if I wanna play with you and r_k?

... Yes, I suppose that you are a kit.
I guess you're the only exception.
brooding_nice_tokit1: Uhmm- I mean, I haven't seen you around so often.
You've grown up quite a lot, haven't you?
Sorry, I'm not good at being around with kits. Just- Just get back to the nursery. I think that r_q is waiting for you there.
[t_c lowers their gaze to you sadly, then looks at the nursery before stalking off.]
brooding_nice_tokit01: [You see t_c sitting alone near the clearing and decide to approach them.]
[They look up surprised as you slowly slide a little flower over to them.]
[They don't say much, but they seem happy about the small gift.]
brooding_fromparent2: y_c, what happened to your fur?
It's full of thistles, you didn't notice?
[Purring all the while, t_c carefully picks all of the thistles out of your fur.]
brooding_fromparent4: [Even though they're your own parent, t_c clearly has no idea how to talk to you.
unabashed_general: Hi there, little one! Have your parents taught you about how kittens are born yet?
So, you see... When one cat loves another very much...
H-Hey, r_c what are you doing?! I'm just trying to educate the clan's kits!
unabashed_murder: How could you, you little, fox-hearted piece of dung?
I'll gouge your eyes out the first occasion I get!
unabashed_murder1: Stay away from me, you murderer! I don't want anything to do with you!
stable_14: What are you doing here, y_c? You shouldn't be here... I just need time alone, please.

What's it like? It feels like it's eating me up from the inside, tearing me apart, ripping me open, swallowing me whole. This hole, this pit, it's agonising. But- that's the cost to lose someone you love.

With love, comes loss, that's the price we pay. And it's so worth it. Because if we could do it again, we would, and wouldn't change a thing. To love is both a blessing and a curse. Don't let the fear of losing someone stop you from loving them, ever.
Cherish every moment, every fight, every breath.
Thank you for visiting me, y_c. You remind me so much of them, thank you... Now run off and play, and please, y_c, never stop loving those around you. Kin or clanmate.
stable_12: Little kit... It's okay, it's okay y_c.
I know this isn't easy, you didn't deserve it- you don't deserve this grief. You're okay, little kit, you're okay. If you need a shoulder to cry on, I'm here. It's okay. It's okay.
Let it out, I'm here for you. It's okay. You're okay, y_c.
unabashed_you_ill: Is there anything I can do to help...?
Even if it's just, I dunno, grabbing some moss for you.
stable_7: Really, you want to hear the song again? Ok, fine... Remember, you asked for this.
There's no place like c_nClan, because here we are wild and free! And nobody can disagree! Look at the stars, the way they shine! StarClan has given us bountiful time.
And prey and rocks and leaves of gold- may StarClan continue to sing the songs of old. From once before and now onwards, as a clan we strive forward. We push on. And this is the c_nClan cats' song!
insult_1: [You feel too guilty to insult this cat.]
insult_2: [You approach, an insult on your tongue, but realize t_c is curled in a ball, soft sobs coming from them.]

Not to mention the assessments, the huge territory, the crushing loneliness, the massive weight of your clanmates' expectations on your shoulders ...
... I'm sorry, what was I talking about? Oh, yeah. You'll be fine, don't worry.
neurotic_tokit5: Careful, y_c! Don't play near those thorns!

Great StarClan, if anything happened to you ...

neurotic_tokit6: StarClan, y_c, are you almost an apprentice already?
I wish I could just keep you little forever, so you could stay in the nursery with me.

assertive_youkit: Hey, pipsqueak! Sure, I'll play a game!
What do you want? Moss-ball? Feather toss? Hunt the pebble? Leader of the hill?
Why do I know so many kit games?
Heh. You think you're the only little tike who's ever wanted a game with ol' t_c?
Guess I'm more popular around the nursery than you might've thought.
Say, there's this fun game you might not've heard of yet ... I can teach it to you, if you want!
[t_c spends the rest of the morning explaining the rules of the game, but another cat calls them off to do their duties before the game can actually begin.]
assertive_youkit1: [t_c notices you sneaking up on a feather and drops down beside you, waggling their haunches.]
And y_c creeps forward with an impeccable hunter's crouch on what appears to be a raven feather, truly remarkable ...
Oh, a slight swish of the tail, the sign of a confident warrior ...
y_c steadies their haunches, could this be the moment of truth ...?
An incredible catch from y_c, the mightiest hunter in c_nClan!
[t_c hoists you onto their shoulders and parades you around camp as you giggle uncontrollably.]
assertive_youkit2: y_c, do you know how to strike fear into the hearts of your enemies?
Let me hear your warrior's roar!
[You try to roar, like you've heard the older cats do, but all you can muster is a pitiful squeak.]
sweet_9: Welcome to the world, y_c. You've got lots of growing up to do, but I know you'll be just fine.
sweet_10: [t_c spots you trying to wiggle your way to freedom, and moves you back into the nursery with a purr.]

sweet_11: Aw, you're so adorable! My old housefolk were right, newborn kittens really are like potatoes...

grieving: [t_c can't help but smile looking at your antics in the nursery.]

Just you wait, y_c. You and I are gonna do big things together!
newborn_fromcool: Wow, is that the most beautiful little kit you've ever seen, or what?

newborn_dislike: ... So, are we just letting anyone into the Clan now, or ...?
newborn_introspective: The miracle of life never ceases to amaze me ...

Ah, I guess all this is to say ... Welcome to the world, y_c.
newborn_brooding: Hmph. Anyone who thinks these things are cute must be delusional.
stable_kit_younewborn_1: Wowza, look at y_c! Aww, they're so tiny, like a miniature version of you, y_p!
I hope they grow up big and strong.
Big and strong like me! Maybe strongerer than me... maybe??? No nevermind, I want to be the strongerest!

Yippee! See, I can sing! Y_c thinks so! Hey t_s did you see that? HEY! Don't shake your head at me! If y_c thinks I can sing then they must be right!
stable_kit_younewborn_3: [t_c trots into the nursery and drops a mossball into the nest.]
See this, y_c? This is called a mossball and you should remember that! You bat it around with your paws like this, see? And you use it to play really fun games! You're going to love it!
[r_c snickers and reminds t_c that you're a newborn, far younger than they are and that you probably don't understand a word they said. t_c puffs out their little chest.]
Well, yeah, I know that! But I thought that maybe they'd like to see one for the first time because then that way they'll like playing games with me!
[r_c states that it's a nice gesture and lovely thought but maybe y_p wouldn't want their kittens playing with such a big toy until you're a little older.]
[y_p laughs it off and pushes the ball towards t_c and asks if they want to play.]
[You squint as you watch your loving parent paw the ball back and forth, your whiskers twitch eagerly, maybe when you're older this will be a fun game! You will remember this.]
stable_kit_younewborn_4: I think the nursery is going to get a little crowded here with more of us... It will be very noisy when you get a little older and I don't really want that...
[t_c looks up at r_q and with a blunt expression asks,]
Can we get rid of it? I don't want it.

[The queen scolds the kitten for their behaviour and escorts them out of the den to find their parents to tell them. You don't understand what's going on but judging by the glare of the queen- it can't be good...]
warrior_to_newborn: Look how tiny they are, r_c!
Give them a few moons, and they'll be exploring the territory with wide-eyed wonder, just like we did when we were young.
unlawful_newborn1: In the chaos of this Clan, they'll have to toughen up fast. Survival doesn't favor the weak.
unlawful_newborn2: Look at them, all snug and secure in their nest. They have no idea what the world outside the nursery is like. It's not all soft moss out here.
unlawful_newborn3: Cute little thing, aren't they? But cuteness won't help in a fight.
They better learn to be sharp and cunning if they want to last.
unlawful_newborn4: They're born into rules and codes. Pity. In the wild rogue life, it's every cat for themselves. That's the real way of life, not these Clan fairy tales.
unlawful_newborn5: They say it's a blessing to be born in a Clan. Ha! Let's see how long it takes before they see the hypocrisy, the lies. I did, and look where I am now.
unlawful_newborn6: [r_q beckons t_c into the nursery to visit you. t_c walks past without a glance.]
unlawful_newborn7: Another soul chained by the Clan's traditions... and Warrior Code.
Maybe, just maybe, they'll be the one to break free, to see the world for what it really is.
unlawful_newborn8: That little one doesn't know the harshness of the world yet.
Maybe they'll be lucky, maybe they'll find happiness. I hope they do, even if I couldn't.
upstanding_newborn: This kit is a precious new leaf in the Clan's history.
We must nurture them with the wisdom of our ancestors and the strength of our code.
upstanding_newborn2: Look at those tiny paws! A future warrior of the Clan, no doubt.
With the right guidance, they will grow to uphold our values and honor. Unlike some of the cats here.
[t_c glares at some other cat outside of the nursery.]
upstanding_newborn3: [t_c looks solemn as they stand over you.]
I vow to protect and guide this young one, to help them understand the importance of loyalty and courage in the life of a Clan cat.
[Behind them, r_w can't help but snicker at their dramatic oath.]
upstanding_newborn4: y_c's the future of the Clan, huh?
silly_newborn1: That mew is so squeaky! It's like a tiny mouse trying to roar. Don't worry, you'll find your big cat voice soon... or just keep squeaking, it's adorable!
silly_newborn2: Oh, you've got your eyes open! Wait until you see the world outside - it's full of big warriors who pretend to be serious but really just want to play mossball and nap in the sun, just like you.
silly_newborn3: [t_c prances into the nursery, tail high.]
[They coo at you, a smile on their face.]
Oh! Aren't you just the cutest thing?
